Before the help session, this month [Raúl Riesco Jarrín](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=jHBYsW0AAAAJ&view_op=list_works&sortby=pubdate) will be provide an overview on how you can make your code faster and more efficient with parallelisation using the [parallel](https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/parallel/versions/3.6.2) and [foreach](https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/foreach/versions/1.5.2) packages.
